ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: A revelation from the All-Merciful, the Most Merciful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: A revelation from the most benevolent, ever-merciful,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: This is a revelation from the Most Merciful, the Most Compassionate,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: This is the revelations from the Beneficent, Merciful God.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: This (Qur’an) is sent down from the Most Gracious, the Most Merciful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: A revelation from the Most Gracious, the Most Merciful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: A revelation from the Beneficent, the Merciful Allah:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: A sending down from the Merciful, the Compassionate.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: A revelation from the Beneficent, the Merciful,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: A revelation from [God], the Most Gracious, the Most Merciful --
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: This is a revelation from the Compassionate, the Merciful -
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: A [gradually] sent down [revelation] from the All-beneficent, the All-merciful,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: A Revelation from (Allah), Most Gracious, Most Merciful;-
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: A revelation from Allah, the Most Beneficent, the Most Merciful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: A sending down from the Merciful, the Most Merciful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: A revelation from the Most Gracious, the Most Merciful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: [This is] a revelation from the Entirely Merciful, the Especially Merciful -
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [41:2] A revelation from the Compassionate, the Merciful (tanzīlun mina’l-rahmāni’l-rahīm, the subject).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (A revelation from the Beneficent, the Merciful,
